title: Codette v2 Demo: Neuro-Symbolic AI Assistant
subtitle: Test and explore Codette's reasoning engine using bundled CLI, API, and test runners.
description:
This notebook walks you through how to install and interact with the Codette AI system, a neuro-symbolic assistant that blends creativity, symbolic reasoning, and ethical filtering.

It leverages the pip-installable Codette package and demonstrates interactive queries and batch processing.
To use it, simply run each cell in order.
